summary: Russia, 1820s: Onegin inherits his uncle's country estate and moves there from St. Petersburg. He befriends his neighbor, Lensky, and meets Tatyana through him. She falls in love with Onegin but he just wants friendship.
cast: Ralph Fiennes|Liv Tyler|Toby Stephens|Lena Headey|Martin Donovan|Alun Armstrong|Simon McBurney|Harriet Walter|Jason Watkins|Irene Worth|Gwenllian Davies|Margery Withers|Geoffrey McGivern|Tim McMullan|Tim Potter|Elizabeth Berrington|Ian East|Richard Bremmer|Chloe Elise Hanslip|Marion Betzold|Chris Lee Wright|Tom Eastwood|Francesca Annis|Eric Colvin|Dan Farrell
title: Onegin
